comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: Liggett (correct spelling) as has been noted elsewhere in comments to other incorrectly named "Leggett" photos.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Lindley Miller Garrison was Secretary of War in Woodrow Wilson's cabinet, 1913-16. Other Bain/LOC photos of General Hunter Liggett, commander of the Gettysburg 50th Anniversary encampment (his name misspelled as Leggett): www.flickr.com/search/?q=leggett&w=8623220@N02

comment.author: 21734563@N04
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Veterans of the American Civil War, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
